briefTitle: Study of NGX-4010 for the Treatment of Painful HIV-Associated Neuropathy
officialTitle: A Multicenter Randomized, Double-Blind, Controlled Study of NGX-4010 for the Treatment of Painful HIV-Associated Neuropathy

interventions.name: NGX-4010, 8% capsaicin patch
otherNames: the brandname of NGX-4010, 8% capsaicin patch is Qutenza.

interventions.name: NGX-4010, 8% capsaicin patch
otherNames: The brandname of NGX-4010, 8% capsaicin patch is Qutenza.

summary: The purpose of the study was to assess the efficacy and safety of NGX-4010 applied for 30 or 60 minutes for the treatment of painful HIV-associated neuropathy.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Primary Measure of Efficacy Was the Percent Change in the "Average Pain for the Past 24 Hours" Numeric Pain Rating Scale (NPRS) Score From Baseline During Weeks 2 to 12.
